Regulation Name(s): Creatine phosphokinase/creatine kinase or isoenzymes test system
Method(s)/Technology(ies): Two-step sandwich immunoassay with streptavidin microparticles
Document Summary: FDA 510(k) summary for Elecsys CK-MB STAT and Elecsys CK-MB immunoassays for quantitative measurement of CK-MB isoenzyme using ECLIA on Elecsys and cobas e analyzers.
Indications for Use Summary: Immunoassay for the in vitro quantitative determination of the MB isoenzyme of creatine kinase in human serum and plasma, used as an aid in the diagnosis of myocardial infarction on Elecsys and cobas e immunoassay analyzers.
